markdownRemark.html:
I am giving a presentation tonight on the ASP.NET MVC web application framework at the Jaxdug. If you have not come out to a Jaxdug meeting before, you should. They do a good job of covering new development technology.

I will post the slides up on this website tonight after the presentation.

frontmatter.title: ASP.NET MVC Presentation Tonight at JaxDug User Group
ASP .NET MVC framework presentation at May 5th JAXDUG meeting
